report_title: Electronic Part & Equipment Wholesaling in the US
executive_summary: Electronic equipment and parts wholesalers distribute various electronics, including communications equipment, computer software, semiconductors and other electronic components, alongside repair and maintenance services. Wholesalers have benefited from a surge in demand as notable technological advancements have encouraged more end market purchases. The rising prominence of e-commerce has also driven demand from retailers, enhancing the need for new devices and equipment; wholesalers have also supported retailers with diminishing physical footprints. Improvements in communication infrastructure, like 5G implementation, have made online operations easier and pushed consumers to purchase new.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Wholesalers Benefit From Rapid Technological Innovation
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Overhauls to traditional communication infrastructure with the advent of services, the Internet of Things and 5G, require large quantities of communications equipment.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: WHOLESALERS GRAPPLE WITH MAJOR PRICE CHANGES
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Semiconductor and electrical component prices have steadily declined over the past decade following hastening yearly innovations and more efficient production methods.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: THE PANDEMIC EXPANDS THE NEED FOR ELECTRONIC PARTS AND EQUIPMENT
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: The pandemic drastically altered the economic outlook and daily lives of most businesses and consumers.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Wholesale Bypass Trends Threaten the Industry
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Greater online connectivity has also threatened wholesalers.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Overhauled Communication Infrastructure Will Push Businesses to Modernize
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Communications companies will continue to expand 5G infrastructure, creating extensive demand for communications products.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: RECOVERING ECONOMIC CONDITIONS WILL SUPPORT CONSUMER MARKETS
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Consumer sentiment tumbled following the pandemic as inflation skyrocketed.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: GOVERNMENT SPENDING WILL ALTER SUPPLY CHAINS
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: The CHIPS and Science Act aims to lower the United States' reliance on imported semiconductors.
Increased direct-to-consumer sales have given buyers greater purchasing power.

industry_definition: Companies in this industry wholesale electronic parts and equipment. Products include antennas, broadcasting equipment, communications equipment, computer chips and boards, radio and radar equipment, electronic condensers and connectors, integrated circuits, modems and navigational equipment. Wholesaling activities exclude electrical.

negative_impact_factors: Barriers To Entry Level low - steady

opportunities: Price of semiconductor and electronic components

key_trends: Improvements to communication infrastructure has led to increased demand.
Reshoring of semiconductor production will aid wholesalers.
The price of semiconductors sways the price of tech as a whole.

market_segmentation.segment_description: Wholesalers engage in business with one another.
Businesses purchase various electronic equipment for end use.
Manufacturers use wholesalers to source electronic parts.
Retailers purchase various goods from wholesalers for resale.

products_and_services.product_description: Communications equipment includes routers and modems.
Semiconductors are essential in the electrical part and equipment supply chain.
This segment includes smaller components of an electronic device.
This segment includes complete computers and applicable software.
Wholesalers offer rentals of products and repair services.

tier_1_suppliers: Gold & Silver Ore Mining in the US
Plastic & Resin Manufacturing in the US
tier_2_suppliers: Semiconductor & Circuit Manufacturing in the US
Plastics & Rubber Machinery Manufacturing in the US
tier_1_buyers: Communication Equipment Manufacturing in the US
Consumer Electronics Stores in the US
Telecommunication Networking Equipment Manufacturing in the US
tier_2_buyers: Healthcare and Social Assistance in the US
Telemarketing & Call Centers in the US

demand_determinants.determinant_title: Communications Equipment is in High Demand
demand_determinants.determinant_description: The variety of applications of communication equipment ensures demand.

business_locations.location_description: Many leading tech companies are headquartered on the West Coast.
The Southeast is home to the largest portion of US population.
The Mid-Atlantic is home to a variety of tech-enabled service industries.

regulations_points.regulation_title: MOST REGULATIONS TARGET MANUFACTURERS, NOT WHOLESALERS
regulations_points.regulation_description: Wholesalers need to ensure that they are purchasing from compliant manufacturers.

regulations_points.regulation_title: Exporting wholesalers face tariffs from other countries
regulations_points.regulation_description: Companies also adhere to US customs regulations.
Wholesalers must secure licenses to operate in the United States.

barriers_points.barrier_title: Lack of capital for technology investment
barriers_points.barrier_description: Most lack adequate capital to fully invest.

basis_points.basis_title: Direct from manufacturer sales cut out wholesalers
basis_points.basis_description: Direct from manufacturer sales cut out the need for wholesalers.
Wholesalers provide a wide variety of products.
Price competition between wholesalers is strong.

concentration_points.concentration_description: Large wholesalers have the resources to secure contracts.
Companies can compete and gain market share in niche sectors.

cost_factors.cost_factor_title: Distributors Benefit from Declining Input Prices
cost_factors.cost_factor_description: Upstream innovation has consistently lowered the price of tech devices.
Companies must accurately process orders and manage purchases.

capital_intensity_points.capital_intensity_description: They require many employees to handle incoming shipments.

volatility_points.volatility_title: CONSISTENT DEMAND SHIELDS WHOLESALERS FROM VOLATILITY
volatility_points.volatility_description: Consistent growth among tech manufacturing industries has kept wholesalers' revenue stable.

technological_change_points.technological_change_description: Most workforces lack adequate capital to fully invest.

FAQs.question: How does your company maintain a competitive edge?
FAQs.answer: Competition is based on price but the breadth of offerings sets companies apart.

FAQs.question: How reliant are your sales on single markets?
FAQs.answer: Large operators reduce dependence on one stream with a large set of customers.
